Model.Title: Flying Birds (Flocking)
Model.Description: In this model the movement of a flock of birds is simulated. The simulation is based on behavoiour rules, invented by Craig Reynolds. Every bird agent has three goals: 1) He wants to move into the same direction as the boids surrounding him 2) He wants to be in the middle of the boids surrounding him 3) He wants to keep a certain distance from the boids surrounding him. These three simple rules are enough to produce flocking behaviour.
